name: Cornbread Recipe
description: Traditional Southern cornbread baked in a hot cast-iron skillet, served with sorghum butter.

ingredients.item: 1½ cups (250g) coarse yellow cornmeal, preferably Anson Mills
2 tablespoons unsalted melted butter, plus more for later
½ cup sorghum syrup or Honey

instructions: Place the Cast Iron Pans in the oven
Incorporate wet ingredients into the dry ones
Put a bit of butter in each mold
Cook at 500°F for about 8 minutes, until golden brown.
Whip together when both butter and syrup are at room temperature.
